dialogue.text: A pal of mine just finished his set,
He looks so cool, he won't want to talk to me...
Jeez, you're always beating yourself up.
Come on, you gotta make that band somehow!
*Guy leads you toward the stage, where a short, stylish figure is twiddling the knobs on a keyboard.*
Hey, Keebs! Key-Blur! My Mini Midi Master!
